name: Advance Course of Surface Tension, Viscosity & Elasticity
description: In this course, Nitin Sachan will cover Waves. The course will cover all the topics in detail and would be helpful for the IIT JEE aspirants. Learners at any stage of their preparation will be benefited from the course. The course will be covered in Hindi and the notes will be provided in English.

value.title: Surface Tension: Angle of Contact, Cohesive and Adhesive Forces
Soap Bubble, Drops, and Radius of Curvature
Square Plate, Toroid, and Capillary Rise
Radius of Curvature and Annular Cylinder Capillary
Surface Energy, Merging of Drops and Soap Bubble
Viscosity: Linear Profile and Heat Generated
Viscosity: Stoke’s Law and Forces in Pipe
Viscosity: Poiseuille’s Equation and Velocity Profile Inside a Pipe
Viscosity: Rate of Heat Generation through Inclined Pipe
